content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetWorkloadInstance path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/workloads/{workload_id}/instances/{instance_name} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name workloadid
desc an edgecompute workload id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name instancename
desc an edgecompute workload instance name
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a workload instance
responses
200
v1getworkloadinstanceresponse
type obj
workloadv1instance
type obj
props
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack that an instance belongs to
workloadid
type str
desc the id of the workload that an instance belongs to
id
type str
desc an instances unique identifier
name
type str
desc an instances name

instance names are generated from their corresponsing workloads slug followed by a unique hash
v1metadata
type obj
props
v1stringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
createdat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was created
nullable true
updatedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable true
deleterequestedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date an entity was requested to be deleted
nullable true
version
type str
desc a metadata entrys version number

metadata versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
desc metadata associated with an entity
workloadv1location
type obj
props
name
type str
desc a human readable location name
city
type str
desc a locations city
citycode
type str
desc a locations city expressed as an iata airport code
subdivision
type str
desc a locations subdivision
subdivisioncode
type str
desc a locations subdivision code
country
type str
desc a locations country
countrycode
type str
desc a locations iso31661 alpha2 country code
region
type str
desc a locations state or province
regioncode
type str
desc a locations iso31662 region code
continent
type str
desc a locations continent
continentcode
type str
desc a locations continent code
latitude
type num
format double
desc a locations geographic latitude
longitude
type num
format double
desc a locations geographic longitude
desc geographic location information
workloadv1instanceinstancephase
type str
default instancephaseunspecified
desc an instances startup state

 instancephaseunspecified stackpath is unable to determine the instances startup state
  starting the instance is still initializing
  running the instance is running
  failed the instance failed to start
  completed the instance finished running
  scheduling the instance is being scheduled
  stopped the instance is stopped
ipaddress
type str
desc an instances ip address
externalipaddress
type str
desc an instances publicly accessible ip address
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an instance was created
startedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an instance was started
deletedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an instance was deleted
networkinterfaces
type arr
workloadv1networkinterfacestatus
type obj
props
network
type str
desc a network interfaces name
ipaddress
type str
desc a network interfaces primary ip address
ipaddressaliases
type str
desc additional ip addresses bound to a network interface
gateway
type str
desc a network interfaces gateway address
desc network interfaces that are attached to an instance in a workload
desc an instances network interfaces
v1resourcerequirements
type obj
props
v1stringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
desc resource requirements for an object

resource requirements are key/value pairs
v1containerspecmapentry
type obj
v1containerspec
type obj
props
image
type str
desc the location of a docker image to run as a container
command
type str
desc the commands that start a container
v1environmentvariablemapentry
type obj
v1environmentvariable
type obj
props
value
type str
desc an environment variables value
secretvalue
type str
desc a sensitive environment variable that should not be exposed
desc the location to obtain a value for an environment variable
desc a string to environment variable key/value pair
v1instanceportmapentry
type obj
v1instanceport
type obj
props
port
type integer
format int32
desc the network port
protocol
type str
desc the network protocol for the port

values are either tcp or udp defaults to tcp
enableimplicitnetworkpolicy
type bool
format bool
desc allow the internet to connect to the port

when true this port will be given an implicit network policy of priority 65534 permitting 0000/0 access to the port this can be overridden by creating network policies of a higher priority to block the port
desc a named port for an instance of a workload
desc a string to network port key/value pair
v1probe
type obj
props
v1httpgetaction
type obj
props
path
type str
desc the path portion of the url to request
port
type integer
format int32
desc the tcp port to query in the http request
scheme
type str
desc http scheme to use in the http request
v1stringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
desc execute an http get request against an endpoint running on an instance
v1tcpsocketaction
type obj
port
type integer
format int32
desc the tcp port to quert
desc connect to an instances tcp port
initialdelayseconds
type integer
format int32
desc the number of seconds after a workload instance has started before liveness probes are initiated
timeoutseconds
type integer
format int32
desc the number of seconds after which a probe times out

defaults to 1 second minimum value is 1
periodseconds
type integer
format int32
desc how often in seconds to perform a probe

default to 10 seconds minimum value is 1
successthreshold
type integer
format int32
desc the minimum consecutive successes for a probe to be considered successful after having failed

defaults to 1 must be 1 for liveness minimum value is 1
failurethreshold
type integer
format int32
desc the minimum consecutive failures for a probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

defaults to 3 minimum value is 1
desc a health check probe against a workload instance to determine if it is alive or ready to receive traffic
v1resourcerequirements
type obj
props
v1stringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
desc resource requirements for an object

resource requirements are key/value pairs
volumemounts
type arr
v1instancevolumemount
type obj
props
slug
type str
desc the slug of the volume claim to mount
mountpath
type str
desc the path in an instance to mount a volume
desc describes mounting a volume on containers or vms in an instance
desc volumes to mount in the container
desc the specification for the desired state of a container in a workload
desc a string to container configuration key/value pair
containerstatuses
type arr
v1containerstatus
type obj
props
name
type str
desc a container status name
v1containerstatuscontainerphase
type str
default containerphaseunspecified
desc which phase of runtime a container is currently in

 containerphaseunspecified the container has not reported a state back or stackpath is unable to determine the containers state
  starting the container is starting up
  running the container is running
  failed the container has terminated due to a failure
  stopped the container was terminated by the user
startedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a container started
finishedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a container terminated
containerstatuswaiting
type obj
props
reason
type str
desc the reason that a container is waiting to start
message
type str
desc a more detailed explanation of a containers waiting state
desc properties related to containers that are starting up
containerstatusrunning
type obj
startedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a container started
desc properties related to running containers
containerstatusterminated
type obj
props
exitcode
type integer
format int32
desc the exit code of the command that started the container
reason
type str
desc the reason a container terminated
message
type str
desc a more detailed explanation of a containers termination
startedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a container started
finishedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a container terminated
desc properties related to terminated containers
ready
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a container is running and ready for service
restartcount
type integer
format int32
desc how many times a container has restarted since it was first started
containerid
type str
desc a unique value that identifies a container
desc the status of a container in a workload
desc status of the containers running within the workload instance
v1virtualmachinespecmapentry
type obj
v1virtualmachinespec
type obj
props
image
type str
desc the image to use for the virtual machine

this is in the format of / if the image tag portion is omitted default is assumed which is the most recently created ready and nondeprecated image of that slug a set of common images is present on the stackpathedge stack
userdata
type str
format base64
desc base64 encoded cloudinit compatible userdata
v1instanceportmapentry
type obj
v1instanceport
type obj
props
port
type integer
format int32
desc the network port
protocol
type str
desc the network protocol for the port

values are either tcp or udp defaults to tcp
enableimplicitnetworkpolicy
type bool
format bool
desc allow the internet to connect to the port

when true this port will be given an implicit network policy of priority 65534 permitting 0000/0 access to the port this can be overridden by creating network policies of a higher priority to block the port
desc a named port for an instance of a workload
desc a string to network port key/value pair

defaults to 1 second minimum value is 1

default to 10 seconds minimum value is 1

desc the minimum consecutive successes for a probe to be considered successful after having failed

defaults to 1 must be 1 for liveness minimum value is 1

type obj
props
slug
type str
desc the slug of the volume claim to mount
mountpath
type str
desc the path in an instance to mount a volume
desc describes mounting a volume on containers or vms in an instance
desc volumes to mount in the virtual machine
desc the specification for the desired state of a virtual machine in a workload
desc a string to virtual machine configuration key/value pair
virtualmachinestatuses
type arr
v1virtualmachinestatus
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the name of the virtual machine the status applies to
virtualmachinestatusphase
type str
default unknown
reason
type str
desc a short reason why the virtual machine is in its current phase
message
type str
desc a longer message with details about why the virtual machine is in its current phase
desc the status of a virtual machine
desc the status of the virtual machines running within the workload instance
reason
type str
desc a short reason that explains why an instance is in a phase
message
type str
desc a longer message that provides more detail on why an instance is in a phase
scheduledat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an instance was scheduled
desc an instance of a workload deployment
desc a response from a request to retrieve a workloads instances
title: 12_Instances_GetWorkloadInstance_64.json
